statements: SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE DeviceID = 1;
SELECT SensorType, SensorValue FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE SensorType = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE SensorValue > 50;
SELECT DeviceID, MAX(SensorValue) AS MaxSensorValue FROM SupplyChainIoTData GROUP BY DeviceID;
SELECT DISTINCT SensorType FROM SupplyChainIoTData ORDER BY SensorType DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE SensorType = 'Temperature';
SELECT DeviceID, SensorType, SensorValue FROM SupplyChainIoTData ORDER BY Timestamp DESC;
SELECT DeviceID, SensorType, AVG(SensorValue) AS AverageValue FROM SupplyChainIoTData GROUP BY DeviceID, SensorType;
SELECT DeviceID, SensorType, SensorValue FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE SensorValue > 50 ORDER BY SensorValue DESC;
SELECT DeviceID, SensorType, Timestamp FROM SupplyChainIoTData WHERE SensorType LIKE '%humidity%';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature FROM IoT_Device_Data ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Predictive_Maintenance_Log WHERE prediction_result = 'Maintenance Required';
SELECT log_id, device_id, timestamp FROM Predictive_Maintenance_Log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, humidity FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE humidity < 60 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM IoT_Device_Data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM IoT_Device_Data GROUP BY device_id HAVING data_count > 100;

SELECT PM.log_id, PM.device_id, PM.prediction_result, PML.maintenance_action FROM Predictive_Maintenance_Log PM JOIN Predictive_Maintenance_Log PML ON PM.device_id = PML.device_id WHERE PM.prediction_result = 'Maintenance Required' ORDER BY PM.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location, last_reported_time FROM devices WHERE device_id = 101;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT device_name, location FROM devices ORDER BY last_reported_time DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT maintenance_description, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_logs WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT device_name, location, MAX(last_reported_time) FROM devices;
SELECT device_name, location, last_reported_time FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT * FROM Supply_chain WHERE current_status = 'In transit';
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT destination_location, source_location FROM Supply_chain WHERE shipment_id = 'abc123';
SELECT device_id, prediction_date, predicted_issue FROM Predictive_maintenance WHERE confidence_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoT_devices WHERE location='Factory A'
SELECT device_id, device_name, last_reported_time FROM IoT_devices WHERE device_type='Sensor' AND location='Warehouse' ORDER BY last_reported_time DESC
SELECT shipment_id, source_location, destination_location, current_status FROM Supply_chain WHERE current_status='In Transit'
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_date, technician_name FROM Maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM device_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM device_data WHERE humidity > 50;
SELECT description, device_id FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT device_id, maintenance_date, technician FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT device_id, analysis_date, prediction_result FROM predictive_maintenance_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM device_data WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT device_id, location, last_reported FROM device_location WHERE location LIKE 'Lab%' ORDER BY last_reported ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, device_id, scheduled_date, description FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE description ILIKE '%inspection%' ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, device_id, maintenance_date, technician, log_description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE maintenance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY device_id, maintenance_date;
SELECT analysis_id, device_id, analysis_date, prediction_result, confidence_level FROM predictive_maintenance_analysis WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
